about_the_game:
THIS GAME IS CURRENTLY IN PRE-ALPHA

Relive historical battles spanning from Antiquity to the 19th century. Play as the leader of one of the conflicting armies and maneuver under the same conditions as your predecessor. Modify or reproduce the course of the battle to confirm or not its outcome. Understand the events that led to certain strategic choices and try different paths to gain the upper hand over your enemy. Face history alone.

Will you do better than your predecessor?

Maneuver on the same terrain and in the same weather conditions as back then. Adapt to authentic enemy troop movements, as long as you follow the steps of history. Compose with the same units and their attributes: morale, ammunition, capabilities, expertise, etc.

Anticipate, precipitate or prevent major key events that have influenced the outcome of the battle as we know it. Whether it's the arrival of reinforcements, the death of a general or the explosion of a building, it's up to you to adapt. Use the full range of possibilities to your maximum advantage.

Each battle involves the participation of a historian to ensure authenticity. Thanks to these collaborators, gaps in historical information are filled by estimation, and the nature of potential uchronistic events is seriously established.

Avant-Garde will have a simple, concise tutorial, to ensure that every player understands how the game mechanics work. Two attack modes will be available: automatic attack and precise attack. So whether you're a beginner or an expert, the field of glory is within your grasp.

Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 3 GHz Quad-Core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia® GeForce™ GTX 1050-Ti (4GB) / AMD® Radeon™ RX 570 (4GB)
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows compatibile sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 3 GHz Six-Core
  • Graphics: Nvidia® GeForce™ RTX 2060 (6GB) / AMD® Radeon™ RX 5700 (8GB)
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows compatibile sound card

short_description: Avant-Garde is a real-time strategy game that recreates historical battles. Face the same conditions and resources available at the time. Embody the leader of one of the conflicting armies. Simulate, understand, and challenge history in authentic battles verified by historians!
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain
*languages with full audio support
